title: Forest: Focus for Productivity
description: Forest is a beautifully designed focus and productivity app that helps you stay away from distractions. When you start a focus session, a virtual tree begins to grow. If you leave the app before the timer ends, the tree withers. Over time, you’ll build a lush digital forest that represents your focused hours. The app also partners with real-world tree-planting organizations, so your productivity can make a real environmental impact.

title: SmPlan: ToDo List With Reminder
description: SmPlan is an elegant to-do list and reminder manager built to simplify your daily planning. Organize your tasks by category, set recurring reminders, snooze them if needed, and sync seamlessly with Google Tasks. With its clean interface, dark mode, and progress tracking features, SmPlan helps you stay productive and focused every day — whether at work, study, or home.

title: FLIP - Focus Timer for Study
description: FLIP brings the Pomodoro technique to your study sessions with a modern twist. You can set focus blocks, monitor your study time in real time, and view comprehensive analytics for daily, weekly, and monthly progress. It’s widely used by students worldwide to build discipline and stay consistent while preparing for exams or deep work sessions.

title: Pomocat - Cute Pomodoro Timer
description: Pomocat turns your productivity routine into something fun and adorable. Each focus session is guided by a cute cat character who reacts to your progress — stay focused and the cat stays happy, get distracted and it looks sad! Earn rewards, unlock new pets, and keep track of your progress through interactive visuals that make focusing genuinely enjoyable.

title: Time Planner: Schedule & Tasks
description: Time Planner is an advanced productivity manager that helps you plan every minute of your day. It combines scheduling, task tracking, and goal visualization into one interface. You can create colored task blocks, drag and drop to reorder, set smart reminders, and see your time usage through graphs. Ideal for professionals and students who love structured productivity.

title: Morning Habits - Daily Routine
description: Morning Habits helps you design a meaningful start to every day. Create custom morning routines, track your consistency streaks, and stay motivated with affirmations and progress insights. Over time, you’ll build strong habits that set the tone for productivity, mindfulness, and well-being throughout the day.

title: Focus Plant: Pomodoro Forest
description: Focus Plant gamifies productivity through an eco-themed experience. When you stay focused, your virtual plants grow and flourish; get distracted, and they stop growing. Over time, you’ll cultivate a beautiful garden representing your consistency. It’s a charming and motivating way to develop long-term focus habits while enjoying the process.

title: Alarmy - Alarm Clock & Sleep
description: Alarmy is a smart alarm clock that makes waking up fun and effective. You can choose missions like solving math problems, shaking your phone, or taking a specific photo to turn off the alarm. It’s designed for heavy sleepers and also includes sleep tracking, bedtime reminders, and gentle wake sounds to improve your overall sleep routine.

title: NoteFlow - Smart Task Notes
description: NoteFlow merges note-taking and task management into one powerful workspace. Write your ideas, convert them into actionable tasks, set reminders, tag categories, and visualize them on a timeline or calendar. Perfect for professionals and creators who want to stay organized without switching between multiple apps.

title: FocusTree - Study & Work Timer
description: FocusTree transforms your focus sessions into a growth journey. Each completed timer grows your virtual tree, representing your productivity progress. The app includes detailed statistics, customizable timers, and daily focus challenges to keep you motivated and consistent in your workflow.

title: MeditateNow - Mindfulness App
description: MeditateNow helps reduce stress and increase focus through guided meditations, breathing exercises, and mindfulness techniques.

title: FocusBoost - Study Timer
description: FocusBoost combines timers, goal tracking, and analytics to enhance study sessions.

title: SleepWell - Sleep Tracker
description: SleepWell tracks your sleep patterns, giving insights and gentle alarms to improve your sleep quality.

title: HabitCoach - Daily Habits
description: HabitCoach helps you track and maintain daily habits with streaks, reminders, and motivational insights.

title: StudyBuddy - Focus Timer
description: StudyBuddy uses Pomodoro-style timers with analytics to keep you focused during study sessions.

title: TaskMaster - Task Manager
description: TaskMaster lets you organize tasks, set priorities, and track your progress across projects.

title: FocusMate - Study Companion
description: FocusMate pairs you with virtual study buddies to increase accountability and productivity.

title: NoteMaster - Notes & Tasks
description: NoteMaster combines note-taking and task management in a clean, intuitive interface.

title: TimeLog - Productivity Tracker
description: TimeLog tracks your tasks and time spent to optimize daily productivity and workflow efficiency.
